title: Christiansted National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       ENTRANCE FEES     Adults - 16 and older $3 -    Day Details: Entry into the historic Danish Fort Christiansvaern. Children under 16 years of age are admitted free with an adult. Senior Citizens with a Golden Age Passport or individuals with a Golden Access Passport are admitted free.    Secure 2 hour parking at Fort Christiansvaern is available until 4:30 pm.
